cn56xx_regs.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 /*! \file cn56xx_regs.h
00003     \brief Host Driver: Register Address and Register Mask values for
00004                         Octeon CN56XX devices.
00005 */

00015 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_MSI_ADDR_HI      0x58
00016 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_MSI_DATA         0x5C

00019 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_CAP         0x70
00020 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_DEVCAP      0x74
00021 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_DEVCTL      0x78
00022 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_LINKCAP     0x7C
00023 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_LINKCTL     0x80
00024 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_SLOTCAP     0x84
00025 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_SLOTCTL     0x88

00030 #define     CN56XX_CONFIG_PCIE_UNCORR_ERR_SEVERITY  0x10C

00049 /*   CN56XX Hardware Manual defines the BAR0 registers as 64-bit registers.
00050      CN56XX does not have any windowed-registers for PCI configuration.
00051 */
00052 
00053 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_CTL_STATUS                  0x0570
00054 
00055 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_CTL_STATUS_2                0x3C00
00056 
00057 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_SCRATCH                     0x0270
00058 
00059 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_DBG_DATA                    0x0510
00060 
00061 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_DMA_PCIE_REQ_NUM            0x05B0

00074 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_ADDR_LO                   0x0200
00075 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_ADDR_HI                   0x0204
00076 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_ADDR64                    CN56XX_WIN_WR_ADDR_LO
00077 
00078 #define    CN56XX_WIN_RD_ADDR_LO                   0x0210
00079 #define    CN56XX_WIN_RD_ADDR_HI                   0x0214
00080 #define    CN56XX_WIN_RD_ADDR64                    CN56XX_WIN_RD_ADDR_LO

00082 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_DATA_LO                   0x0220
00083 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_DATA_HI                   0x0224
00084 #define    CN56XX_WIN_WR_DATA64                    CN56XX_WIN_WR_DATA_LO

00093 #define    CN56XX_BAR1_INDEX_START                 0x0000
00094 #define    CN56XX_PCI_BAR1_OFFSET                  0x10

00097 
00098 
00099 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Input queues */
00100 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_INSTR_ENB               0x1000
00101 
00102 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output queues */
00103 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_OUT_ENB                 0x1010
00104 
00105 
00106 /* 1 register (32-bit) to determine whether Output queues are in reset. */
00107 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PORT_IN_RST_OQ              0x0690
00108 
00109 /* 1 register (32-bit) to determine whether Input queues are in reset. */
00110 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PORT_IN_RST_IQ              0x0694
00111

00114 #define    CN56XX_BAR1_INDEX_REG(idx)              \
00115            (CN56XX_BAR1_INDEX_START + (CN56XX_PCI_BAR1_OFFSET * (idx)))

00121 /*############################ REQUEST QUEUE #########################*/
00122 
00123 /*------- BAR0 Registers ---------*/
00124 /* 32 registers for Input Queue Start Addr - NPEI_PKT0_INSTR_BADDR */
00125 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_BASE_ADDR_START64       0x2800
00126 
00127 /* 32 registers for Input Queue size - NPEI_PKT0_INSTR_FIFO_RSIZE */
00128 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_SIZE_START              0x3000
00129 
00130 /* 32 registers for Instruction Header Options - NPEI_PKT0_INSTR_HEADER */ 
00131 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR_START64   0x3400
00132 
00133 /* 32 registers for Input Doorbell - NPEI_PKT0_INSTR_BAOFF_DBELL */
00134 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_DOORBELL_START          0x2C00
00135 
00136 /* 32 registers for Input Queue Instr Count - NPEI_PKT_IN_DONE0_CNTS */
00137 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT_START       0x2000
00138 
00139 /* Each Input Queue register is at a 16-byte Offset in BAR0 */
00140 #define    CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET                       0x10
00141 
00142 
00143 /* 1 register (32-bit) - instr. size of each input queue. */
00144 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_INSTR_SIZE             0x1020
00145 
00146 
00147 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Back Pressure setting for each input queue. */
00148 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_INPUT_BP_START64           0x3800
00149 
00150 
00151 
00152 
00153 /* 1 register (32-bit) - ES, RO, NS, Arbitration for Input Queue Data &
00154                          gather list fetches.
00155 */
00156 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_INPUT_CONTROL           0x1150
00157 
00158 
00159 /* 1 register (64-bit) - 2 bits for each input ring.
00160 */
00161 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_INSTR_RD_SIZE           0x1190
00162 
00163 
00164 /* 1 register (64-bit) - 2 bits for each input ring.
00165 */
00166 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IN_PCIE_PORT                0x11A0
00167 
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171 /*------- Request Queue Macros ---------*/
00172 /* 32 registers for Input Queue Start Addr */
00173 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_BASE_ADDR64(iq)          \
00174        (CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_BASE_ADDR_START64 + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00175 
00176 
00177 /* 32 registers for Input Queue size */
00178 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_SIZE(iq)                 \
00179        (CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_SIZE_START + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00180 
00181 
00182 /* 32 IQ Packet Instruction Header Registers */
00183 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR64(iq)      \
00184        (CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR_START64 + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00185 
00186 
00187 /* 32 registers for Input Doorbell */
00188 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_DOORBELL(iq)             \
00189        (CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_DOORBELL_START + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00190 
00191 
00192 /* 32 registers for Input Instruction Count */
00193 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT(iq)          \
00194        (CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT_START + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00195 
00196 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_IQ_BP64(iq)                 \
00197        (CN56XX_NPEI_INPUT_BP_START64 + ((iq) * CN56XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00198 
00199 
00200 
00201 /*------------------ Masks ----------------*/
00202 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_ROUND_ROBIN_ARB         (1 << 22)
00203 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_NS                 (1 << 8)
00204 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP        (1 << 6)
00205 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_RO                 (1 << 5)
00206 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR                 (1 << 4)
00207 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_NS               (1 << 3)
00208 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_ES_64B_SWAP      (2)
00209 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_RO               (1)
00210 
00211 #if  __CAVIUM_BYTE_ORDER == __CAVIUM_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00212 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_MASK                    \
00213             ( CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_ROUND_ROBIN_ARB      \
00214             | CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP     \
00215             | CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR ) 
00216 #else
00217 #define    CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_MASK                    \
00218            ( CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_ROUND_ROBIN_ARB       \
00219             | CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP     \
00220             | CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR              \
00221             | CN56XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_ES_64B_SWAP)
00222 #endif

00226 /*############################ OUTPUT QUEUE #########################*/
00227 
00228 /*------- BAR0 Registers ---------*/
00229 
00230 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Start Addr - NPEI_PKT0_SLIST_BADDR */
00231 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_BASE_ADDR_START64       0x1400
00232 
00233 /* 32 registers for Output Queue size - NPEI_PKT0_SLIST_FIFO_RSIZE */
00234 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_SIZE_START              0x1C00
00235 
00236 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Count - NPEI_PKT0_CNTS */
00237 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKT_SENT_START          0x2400
00238 
00239 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Credits - NPEI_PKT0_SLIST_BAOFF_DBELL */
00240 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKT_CREDITS_START       0x1800
00241 
00242 
00243 /* Each Output Queue register is at a 16-byte Offset in BAR0 */
00244 #define    CN56XX_OQ_OFFSET                       0x10
00245 
00246 
00247 
00248 
00249 /* 1 register for Output queue buffer and info size - NPEI_PKT_SLIST_ID_SIZE */
00250 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_BUFF_INFO_SIZE          0x1180
00251 
00252 /* 1 (64-bit) register for Output Queue Packet Count Interrupt Threshold
00253    & Time Threshold. We use the 32-bit offsets to define distinct addresses. */
00254 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_INT_LEV_PKTS            0x1100
00255 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_INT_LEV_TIME            0x1104
00256 
00257 
00258 /* 1 register (64-bit) - PCIE port for each of 32 Output queues. */
00259 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_PCIE_PORT64            0x10E0
00260 
00261 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Endian-Swap mode for 32 Output Queue Data. */
00262 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ES64          0x10B0
00263 
00264 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Endian-Swap mode for 32 Output Queue ScatterList. */
00265 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_SLIST_ES64             0x1050
00266 
00267 
00268 
00269 
00270 /* 1 register (32-bit) - Relaxed Ordering for 32 Output Queues Data. */
00271 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ROR           0x1090
00272 
00273 /* 1 register (32-bit) - Relaxed Ordering for 32 Output Queues Scatter List. */
00274 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_SLIST_ROR              0x1030
00275 
00276 /* 1 register (32-bit) - No Snoop mode for 32 Output Queues Data. */
00277 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_DATA_OUT_NS            0x10A0
00278 
00279 /* 1 register (32-bit) - No Snoop mode for 32 Output Queues Scatter List. */
00280 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_SLIST_NS               0x1040
00281 
00282 /* 1 register (32-bit) - Packet OR Byte Count for 32 Output queues Interrupts.*/
00283 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_OUT_BMODE              0x10D0
00284 
00285 /* 1 register (32-bit) - source of ES,RO,NS bits for 32 OQ's.*/
00286 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_DPADDR                 0x1080
00287 
00288 /* 1 register (32-bit) - InfoPtr use for 32 Output Queues.*/
00289 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_IPTR                   0x1070
00290 
00291 
00292 
00293 
00294 
00295 
00296 /*------- Output Queue Macros ---------*/
00297 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Start Addr */
00298 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_BASE_ADDR64(oq)          \
00299        (CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_BASE_ADDR_START64 + ((oq) * CN56XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00300 
00301 
00302 /* 32 registers for Output Queue size */
00303 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_SIZE(oq)                 \
00304        (CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_SIZE_START + ((oq) * CN56XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00305 
00306 
00307 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Sent Count */
00308 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKTS_SENT(oq)            \
00309        (CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKT_SENT_START + ((oq) * CN56XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00310 
00311 
00312 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Credit */
00313 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKTS_CREDIT(oq)          \
00314        (CN56XX_NPEI_OQ_PKT_CREDITS_START + ((oq) * CN56XX_OQ_OFFSET))

00327 
00328 /*############################ DMA QUEUE #########################*/
00329 
00330 /* 1 register (64-bit) - 2 32-bit Counter - 1 for each DMA Queue 0/1. */ 
00331 #define    CN56XX_DMA_CNT_START                   0x05E0
00332 
00333 /* 2 registers (64-bit) - DMA count & Time Interrupt threshold -
00334    NPEI_DMA_0_INT_LEVEL */
00335 #define    CN56XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START             0x05C0
00336 
00337 
00338 #define    CN56XX_DMA_IBUFF_SADDR                 0x0400
00339 
00340 
00341 
00342 
00343 /*---------- DMA Queue Macros ---------*/
00344 #define    CN56XX_DMA_CNT(dq)                      \
00345            (CN56XX_DMA_CNT_START + ((dq) * 4))
00346 
00347 #define    CN56XX_DMA_PKT_INT_LEVEL(dq)            \
00348            (CN56XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START + ((dq) * 0x10))
00349 
00350 #define    CN56XX_DMA_TIME_INT_LEVEL(dq)           \
00351            (CN56XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START + 4 + ((dq) * 0x10))
00352 
00353 #define    CN56XX_DMA_BASE_ADDR(dq)                \
00354            (CN56XX_DMA_IBUFF_SADDR + (0x10 * (dq)))
00355

00359 /*############################ INTERRUPTS #########################*/
00360 
00361 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Interrupt Summary */
00362 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_INT_SUM64                  0x0530
00363 
00364 
00365 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Interrupt Enable */
00366 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_INT_ENB64                  0x0540
00367 
00368 
00369 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Additional Interrupt Summary */
00370 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_INT_A_SUM64                0x0550
00371 
00372 
00373 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Additional Interrupt Enable */
00374 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_INT_A_ENB64                0x0560
00375 
00376 
00377 
00378 
00379 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output Queue Packet/Byte Count Interrupt */ 
00380 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_CNT_INT_ENB            0x1130
00381 
00382 
00383 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output Queue Packet Timer Interrupt */ 
00384 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_TIME_INT_ENB           0x1140
00385 
00386 
00387 
00388 /* 1 register (32-bit) to indicate which Output Queue reached pkt threshold */
00389 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_CNT_INT                0x1110
00390 
00391 /* 1 register (32-bit) to indicate which Output Queue reached time threshold */
00392 #define    CN56XX_NPEI_PKT_TIME_INT               0x1120

00399 /*------------------ Interrupt Masks ----------------*/
00400 
00401 #define    CN56XX_INTR_RML_WR_TIMEOUT            (1)
00402 #define    CN56XX_INTR_RML_RD_TIMEOUT            (1 << 1)
00403 #define    CN56XX_INTR_BAR0_RW_TIMEOUT           (1 << 2)
00404 #define    CN56XX_INTR_IO2BIG                    (1 << 3)
00405 
00406 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_DB_OF                (1 << 4)
00407 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_DB_OF                (1 << 5)
00408 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA2_DB_OF                (1 << 6)
00409 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA3_DB_OF                (1 << 7)
00410 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA4_DB_OF                (1 << 8)
00411 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA_DB_OF                 (0x1F0)
00412 
00413 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_FORCE                (1 << 9)
00414 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_FORCE                (1 << 10)
00415 
00416 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_COUNT                (1 << 11)
00417 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_COUNT                (1 << 12)
00418 
00419 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME                 (1 << 13)
00420 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_TIME                 (1 << 14)
00421 
00422 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PKT_SLIST_OF              (1 << 15)
00423 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PKT_INSTR_OF              (1 << 16)
00424 
00425 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PKT_COUNT                 (1 << 17)
00426 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PKT_TIME                  (1 << 18)
00427 
00428 #define    CN56XX_INTR_RC_MODE                   ((1 << 19) | (1 << 21) \
00429                                                   |(1 << 26) | (1 << 28))
00430 
00431 #define    CN56XX_INTR_CRS_TIMEOUT_PCIE0         ((1 << 20) | (1 << 22))
00432 
00433 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PMU_WAKE_PCIE0            (1 << 23)
00434 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PME_PCIE0                 (1 << 24)
00435 #define    CN56XX_INTR_HOTPLUG_PCIE0             (1 << 25)
00436 
00437 #define    CN56XX_INTR_CRS_TIMEOUT_PCIE1         ((1 << 27) | (1 << 29))
00438 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PMU_WAKE_PCIE1            (1 << 30)
00439 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PME_PCIE1                 (1 << 31)
00440 #define    CN56XX_INTR_HOTPLUG_PCIE1             (1ULL << 32)
00441 
00442 #define    CN56XX_INTR_UNSUPPORTED_TLP           (0x01FFFFFE00000000ULL)
00443 
00444 #define    CN56XX_INTR_INT_A                     (1ULL << 61)
00445 #define    CN56XX_INTR_MIO                       (1ULL << 63)
00446 
00447 
00448 
00449 
00450 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_DATA                 \
00451             ( CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME)
00452 
00453 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_DATA                 \
00454             ( CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_TIME )
00455 
00456 #define    CN56XX_INTR_DMA_DATA                  \
00457             ( CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_DATA              \
00458             | CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_DATA)
00459 
00460 
00461 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PKT_DATA               (CN56XX_INTR_PKT_TIME)
00462 
00463 
00464 /* Sum of interrupts for all PCI-Express Data Interrupts */
00465 #define    CN56XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA                 \
00466            (  CN56XX_INTR_DMA_DATA               \
00467             | CN56XX_INTR_PKT_DATA )
00468 
00469 
00470 
00471 /* Sum of interrupts for Internal Doorbell overflow events */
00472 #define    CN56XX_INTR_ERR_OVERFLOW              \
00473            ( CN56XX_INTR_DMA_DB_OF               \
00474             | CN56XX_INTR_PKT_SLIST_OF           \
00475             | CN56XX_INTR_PKT_INSTR_OF )
00476 
00477 
00478 /* Sum of interrupts for Miscellaneous errors. */
00479 #define    CN56XX_INTR_ERR_MISC                  \
00480            (  CN56XX_INTR_RML_WR_TIMEOUT         \
00481             | CN56XX_INTR_RML_RD_TIMEOUT         \
00482             | CN56XX_INTR_BAR0_RW_TIMEOUT        \
00483             | CN56XX_INTR_IO2BIG )
00484 
00485 
00486 /* Sum of interrupts for all error events */
00487 #define    CN56XX_INTR_ERR                       \
00488            (  CN56XX_INTR_ERR_OVERFLOW           \
00489             | CN56XX_INTR_UNSUPPORTED_TLP        \
00490             | CN56XX_INTR_INT_A                  \
00491             | CN56XX_INTR_ERR_MISC)
00492 
00493 
00494 /* Sum of interrupt for Power-Management Events - PCIE Core 0 */
00495 #define    CN56XX_INTR_POWER_MGMT_PCIE0          \
00496            (  CN56XX_INTR_PMU_WAKE_PCIE0         \
00497             | CN56XX_INTR_PME_PCIE0              \
00498             | CN56XX_INTR_HOTPLUG_PCIE0)
00499 
00500 
00501 /* Sum of interrupt for Power-Management Events - PCIE Core 1 */
00502 #define    CN56XX_INTR_POWER_MGMT_PCIE1          \
00503            (  CN56XX_INTR_PMU_WAKE_PCIE1         \
00504             | CN56XX_INTR_PME_PCIE1              \
00505             | CN56XX_INTR_HOTPLUG_PCIE1)
00506 
00507 
00508 
00509 /* Programmed Mask for Interrupt Sum */
00510 #ifdef CVMCS_DMA_IC
00511 #define    CN56XX_INTR_MASK                      \
00512            (  CN56XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA              \
00513         | CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_COUNT         \
00514         | CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME      \
00515             | CN56XX_INTR_MIO                    \
00516             | CN56XX_INTR_ERR)
00517 #else
00518 #define    CN56XX_INTR_MASK                      \
00519            (  CN56XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA              \
00520             | CN56XX_INTR_DMA0_FORCE             \
00521             | CN56XX_INTR_DMA1_FORCE             \
00522             | CN56XX_INTR_MIO                    \
00523             | CN56XX_INTR_ERR)
00524 #endif

00531 /*------------ Interrupt INT_A  Masks -----------------------*/
00532 
00533 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_DMA_URCA_PCIE0          (1 << 0)
00534 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_DMA_URCA_PCIE1          (1 << 1)
00535 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_INSTR_READ_ERR          (1 << 2)
00536 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_SLIST_PTR_READ_ERR      (1 << 3)
00537 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_INSTR_DATA_READ_ERR     (1 << 4)
00538 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_INSTR_GLIST_READ_ERR    (1 << 5)
00539 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_READ_LOCK_PCIE0         (1 << 6)
00540 #define    CN56XX_INT_A_READ_LOCK_PCIE1         (1 << 7)
